name: Conveyor (PolsGames, Jack Shimield, Richard Stamp, Game Dev, Felix Spear, Madelene)
name_original: Conveyor (PolsGames, Jack Shimield, Richard Stamp, Game Dev, Felix Spear, Madelene)
description:
Conveyor is a single-player puzzle-platformer focused on progression, exploration and momentum in a bleak apocalyptic future and set within the bounds of an AI-controlled munitions factory.

Key features:

- Glimpse of the future: explore multiple levels and collect relics of the future past, all while trying to find the source of the facility's power.

- Speed and momentum: use advanced movement to navigate the ruined halls, conveyors and tunnels and keep yourself alive.

- Use your surroundings: manipulate industrial machinery and objects to progress and get closer to reaching your goal.
